title: Diamond Floral Pendant - A Stunning Addition to Your Jewellery Collection
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with brilliant cut Diamonds. Each stone is carefully selected for its clarity and brilliance. Gold has Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Features floral and round motifs studded with diamonds. The piece blends traditional South Indian influences with modern design sensibilities.The gold work accentuates the brilliance of the diamonds, set in a prong setting for maximum light exposure.
occasions: and special occasions. This versatile piece can elevate both traditional Indian outfits and modern attire.
description: The piece combines the timeless elegance of gold with the brilliance of diamonds. High-quality craftsmanship ensures its durability and lasting beauty. The modern yet traditional design makes it a unique and valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
